issue.summary: incorrect clone name, AC007368 should be RPCI4-809F18 (not RP4-809F18)
issue.description: incorrect clone name, AC007368 should be RPCI4-809F18 (not RP4-809F18)
issue.resolution_text: RPCI4 and RP4 refer to the same library. The clone name for AC007368.11 has been curated for the TPF & AGP.

issue.summary: GeneID: 448989 (PS7), missing in assembly
issue.description: NG_004699.2 does not align to the Reference sequence
issue.resolution_text: Fosmids AC242308.1 and AC217021.3 represent an alternate haplotype that has 30kb additional sequence compared to GRCh37 NC_000012.11 and includes NG_004699.2.

issue.summary: Alternate haplotype at chr.12 p-arm telomere
issue.description: ABC22-2602C16 (AC238894) may represent a different haplotype at the chr. 12 p-arm telomere.
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC238894.3 represents an alternate haplotype that has approximately 6.3kb additional sequence compared to GRCh37 NC_000012.11.

issue.summary: AC243974.2, chrom. 12 alternate loci
issue.description: AC243974.2 possibly represents an alternate loci on chrom. 12
issue.resolution_text: AC243974.2 (CH17-93H22) represents an alternate haplotype than NC_000012.11 component AC018630.40 (RP11-673D15).

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC205793.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383549.1 created to capture sequence from AC205793.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC205793.4, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 6059bp more than GRCh37 component AC022363.24, has been uploaded to the Chr. 12 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC208716.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383550.1 created to capture sequence from AC208716.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC208716.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 8844bp more than component AC084033.3, has been uploaded to the Chr. 12 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC203650.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383551.1 created to capture sequence from AC203650.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC203650.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 6050bp more than component AC007368.11, has been uploaded to the Chr. 12 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC208500.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383552.1 created to capture sequence from AC208500.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC208500.2, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 7052bp more than component AC068305.30, has been uploaded to the Chr. 12 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC225709.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383553.1 created to capture sequence from AC225709.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: The fosmid clone AC225709.3 (ABC12-49050900E13) contains 6161 bp that does not align to reference component AC079953.28 (RP11-399D15). In patch release 7, the extent of anchor component AC079953.28 was trimmed so that it matches the extent of this component used in the GRCh37 reference chromosome.

issue.summary: GeneID: 5544 (PRB3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_006249.4 retains a 1 nt deletion compared to reference genome
issue.resolution_text: AC244131.2 (CH17-457D18) has been uploaded to the Chrom. 12 TPF, correcting the indel affecting the alignment of PRB3 to AC010176.12.

issue.summary: Incorrect alignment for AC145423.8 and AC055713.29
issue.description: Incorrect alignment for AC145423.8 and AC055713.29 may be stored in GRC database; no effect on chromosome sequence.
issue.resolution_text: The correct alignment for the overlap between AC145423.8 and AC055713.29 has been uploaded and marked preferred to be used in the next Build.

issue.summary: AC145423.8 (Phase 2) will not be finished
issue.description: AC145423.8 (Phase 2) needs to be replaced in the TPF
issue.resolution_text: RP11-972P1 has been sequenced and submitted by TGI (AC255553.1) to replace phase2 sequence AC145423.8. AC255553.1 has been added to the Chr. 12 Primary TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 5554 (PRH1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_006250.3 aligns incorrectly to the Reference
issue.resolution_text: Since the Reference represents known length polymorphism (PMID's 18037651 and 22190937), one that appears to be a common allele in African Americans, this issue is resolved.

issue.summary: Three bases reported as rare/wrong for ABCC9
issue.description: Large scale sequencing/genotyping suggests that three locations in ABCC9 have rare or wrong alleles (rs4762720, rs10770865, rs697250).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contigs KF495813.1, KF459680.1, and KF570253.1 have been added to GRCh38, patching AC008250.23 and improving the alignment of ABCC9 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr. 12 CHORI-17 Pathway: PRH1 (Gene ID: 5554)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC018630.40 - AC010176.12 region of Chr. 12. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: AC245078.1 (CH17-26M1) and AC244131.2 (CH17-457D18) have been uploaded to the Chromosome 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF, representing the deletion allele affecting TAS2R64P and TAS2R43.

issue.summary: AC145422.6 is a Phase 2 Clone in the Reference
issue.description: Phase 2 component AC145422.6 is in GRCh37 NC_000012.11
issue.resolution_text: Working-draft sequence AC145422.6 is now submitted by Baylor, correcting the run of N's in this component.

issue.summary: Analysis suggests an inversion in a reference component
issue.description: Analysis suggests an inversion in a reference component AC007619.23
issue.resolution_text: The TPF containing CHM1 component AC255400.1 has been uploaded to the Chr. 12 PATCHES and Chromosome level TPFs, correcting the inversion located in GRCh38 component AC007619.23.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10795 (ZNF268), missing in assembly
issue.description: ZNF268 (GeneID: 10795) extends into the gap at the end of the terminal component of chr. 12 (AC026786.5)
issue.resolution_text: AC226150 (CA-2196C1) closes the gap between AC026786.5 and AP006310.1.

issue.summary: There is a gap between the telomere and Reference component AC026369.21 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000012.10)
issue.description: There is a gap between the telomere and Reference component AC026369.21 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000012.10)
issue.resolution_text: AC215219.3 (ABC7-42389800N19) was sequenced and contains telomeric repeat, extending off of AC026369.21. This closes this gap for GRCh37.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC154092.1 and AC233309.2 in GRCh37 (NC_000012.11)
issue.status_text: We are currently looking for sequence to close this gap.
issue.description: WGS sequences ABBA01017671.1 and AEKP01126603.1 were added to GRCh38 (NC_000012.12), extending off of AC154092.1 into the gap. Also, WGS sequences ABBA01012193.1 and AEKP01126602.1 were added, extending off of AC233309.2. The C1R gene spans this gap (GeneID:715) and is missing sequence as a result of the gap. This is a continuation of gap issue HG-56.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC174068.1 and AC190387.1 in GRCh37 (NC_000012.11)
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of the gap outlined in HG-147.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01053120.1, AEKP01032148.1, and ABBA01005058.1 to the Chrom. 12 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC205581.1 and AC190384.1 in GRCh37 (NC_000012.11)
issue.description: This is a continuation of gap issue HG-58.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01020202.1, AEKP01164321.1 and ABBA01060482.1 to the Chrom. 12 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: GRCh37 component AC205581.1 is Phase2 sequence
issue.status_text: Attempting to identify clone or fosmid sequence to replace Phase 2 sequence AC205581.1
issue.description: GRCh37 component AC205581.1 is Phase2 sequence
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC232989.1 and AC148477.3 in GRCh37 (NC_000012.11)
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of gap issue HG-731.
issue.resolution_text: Further progress of this gap issue can be followed in HG-2276.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55530 (SVOP), near assembly gap
issue.description: AADB02015507.1 and AADB02015508.1 can be used to fill the gap in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of components AC174068.1, ABBA01053120.1, AEKP01032148.1, ABBA01005058.1 and AC190387.1 to the Chromosome 12 TPF, SVOP (GeneID:55530) now has full alignment to GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chrom. 12 Pericentromeric Gap
issue.description: Chromosome 12 component AC129805.7 is placed next to the centromere but does not contain centromeric sequence. (NC_000012.12:37,380,461-37,462,892)
issue.resolution_text: AC256235.1/CH17-263P11 has been submitted and added to the Chr. 12 primary TPF, replacing NC_000012.12 WGS components ABBA01049500.1 and ABBA01049501.1 (NC_000012.12:37,380,461-37,462,892).

issue.summary: GeneID: 84678 (KDM2B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Alignment of GeneID:84678 (KDM2B) has poor alignment to Reference component AC145422.6. This is due to a run of N's in AC145422.6.
issue.resolution_text: Working-draft sequence AC145422.6 is now submitted by Baylor (AC145422.7), correcting the run of N's in this component.

issue.summary: Rare/wrong base in KRAS reported by clinical testing lab
issue.description: chr12:25,368,462 contains a base that is rarely seen in the 1000G project or in other large tested cohorts.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459678.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC092794.10 and improving the alignment of KRAS to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 259291 (TAS2R45), missing in assembly
issue.description: Reference Build 36 seems to be missing NM_176886.1
issue.resolution_text: NM_176886.1 is now represented in the Reference Assembly through the addition of GRCh37 patch release 4 accession GL877876.1 (HG-1062 - AC242308.1 and AC217021.3) and GRCh37 patch 5 release (Not Yet Accessioned) (HG-1133 - AC243974.2).

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible base error in clone affecting UBC representation
issue.description: There is a polymorphism in GeneID:7316 UBC's alignment to the Reference that needs investigated.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig KF455729.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr. 12 TPF, fixing this base for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC217627.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC217627.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC217627.3 was added to the Chrom. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC208069.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC208069.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC208069.3 was added to the Chrom. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC204960.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC204960.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC204960.3 was added to the Chrom. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234331.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234331.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC234331.4 was added to the Chrom. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Under-representation of VNTR within an intron of the CACNA1C gene
issue.status_text: We currently have CH17-136L3 in the sequencing pipeline.
issue.description: Clone AC005344.1 RPCI1-53O8 (matching GRCh37 chr12:2,243,502-2,397,338) greatly under-represents a polymorphic VNTR within an intron of the CACNA1C gene that may have enhancer activity.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC005885.1 and AC007368.11: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC005885.1 and AC007368.11 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: The Chr. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF was re-submitted, correcting clone names for accessions AC005885.1 and AC007368.11 (RPCI5-1135M4 to RP5-1135M4 and RPCI4-809F18 to RP4-809F18).

issue.summary: GeneID: 84876 (ORAI1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will see if we can generate another mini-contig to fix this indel.
issue.description: The reference genome sequence has a 5 nt insertion compared to the available transcript data and NM_032790.3.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC011594.8
issue.description: There is a possible inversion in Reference component AC011594.8 of Chr. 12
issue.resolution_text: Alignment data of other assemblies and various haplotype end-sequences do not suggest an inversion in the Reference.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC087887.11
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC087887.11
issue.resolution_text: The updated pathway including AC270142.1 has been uploaded to both the Chr. 12 Primary TPF and the Chr. 12 PATCH TPF for GRCh38.p6 release.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC079949.45
issue.status_text: Awaiting final decision on how to handle these Kidd 'Variation' issues and whether or not we will add AC195745.1 (WI2-486E17) as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268379.1, GU266866.1, GU269019.1, and GU267286.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~4,971 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC079949.45. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC079949.45
issue.status_text: Awaiting decision as to how the GRC will handle these Kidd 'Variation' issues.
issue.description: Analysis of GU269033.1, GU267151.1, and GU267988.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~4,835 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC079949.45. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC092469.10
issue.description: Analysis of GU267739.1 and GU267913.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~6,964 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC092469.10. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC234852.4 has been added to the reference as a novel patch and represents a 6.96kb insertion allele relative to Chr 12 component AC092469.10.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC005845.13
issue.status_text: Awaiting final decision on how to handle the 'Variation' tickets for these Kidd insertions.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268632.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~761 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC005845.13. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC006057.5
issue.status_text: Awaiting final decision on how to handle 'Variation' issues.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267156.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~ 1,760 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC006057.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within U47924.1
issue.status_text: Awaiting info on how the GRC will handle 'Variation' issues with these Jeff Kidd fosmid-end contigs and whether we should add AC240687.2/ABC21-876F17 as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267895.1 and GU268223.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~2,327 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component U47924.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC023794.37
issue.status_text: Looking for valid sequence for this indel and determining whether or not we will add this as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268640.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~932 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC023794.37. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC079865.14
issue.status_text: Awaiting info on how the GRC will handle 'Variation' issues with these Jeff Kidd fosmid-end contigs and whether AC203605.2 (ABC10-44139700G12) will be added as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267109.1, GU268899.1 and GU267058.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~7,267 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC079865.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC008119.6
issue.status_text: Determining whether or not AC231960.3 (ABC14-50125400M18) will be added as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268245.1 and GU267153.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 12, suggest there may be ~1,207 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC008119.6. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Provide assembly representation for CH17 haplotype in this region
issue.description: Provide assembly representation for CH17 haplotype in this region
issue.resolution_text: An alt locus has been created to provide representation for the CH17 haplotype in this region. GenBank: KI270904.1; RefSeq: NT_187658.1.

issue.summary: Reference component AC092865.10 contains a 32.4kb insertion compared to the CHM1 haplotype.
issue.description: Reference Component AC092865.10 (RP11-113C12) contains a 32.4kb insertion compared to the CHM1 haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: Since this proposed alt does not add any unique sequence to the Reference Assembly, it will not be added.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.status_text: Looking into the possibility of accessioning a CHM1 PacBio sequence that spans this gap.
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (M) in NC_000012.12: 132225197 in component AEKP01194575.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (Y) in NC_000012.12: 122093260 in component AEKP01164321.1.
issue.resolution_text: The updated tpf containing WGS piece AUXG01000113.1, which replaces ambiguous sequence from GRCh38 component AEKP01164321.1, has been uploaded to both the Chr. 12 PATCHES tpf and the Chr. 12 chromosome level TPF.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.status_text: Looking into the possibility of accessioning a CHM1 PacBio sequence that spans this gap.
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (Y) in NC_000012.12: 132222634 in component AEKP01194576.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC232989.1 and AC233270.3 in GRCh38.
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence that spans this gap.
issue.description: AC232989.1 and AC233270.3 are now the flanking components of this gap. WGS sequence AEKP01194576.1 was added for GRCh38, extending off of AC232989.1. WGS sequence AEKP01194575.1 was also added, extending off of AC233270.3. This is a continuation of gap ticket HG-1402.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AUXG01000432.1 needs added near the chr. 12 centromere in GRCh38.
issue.description: AUXG01000432.1 was added near the chr. 12 centromere in GRCh38 (NC_000012.12
issue.resolution_text: AUXG01000432.1 was added to the Reference Assembly, extending off of AC144535.4 and into centromeric repeat of Chr. 12 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Hsa12- unannotated problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion within AC087774.27
issue.resolution_text: CH17-266C19 (AC255545.1) has been submitted and added to the Chromosome 12 Primary TPF, fixing the inversion previously in AC087774.27.

issue.summary: Base position NC_000012.12:120,999,579 contains minor allele in HNF1A (GeneID:6927)
issue.status_text: Looking into whether or not we should update this base. Even though it is a rare allele, that is not reason enough for a change.
issue.description: GRCh38 base position NC_000012.12:120,999,579 contains an 'A' and not a 'G'.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 26834 (RNU4-2), missing in assembly
issue.description: NR_003137.1 aligns to build 36 at 98% identity, suggesting this may not be represented in the current assembly (Build 36).
issue.resolution_text: NR_003137.1 (RNU4-2/RNU4C) is represented in the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 26836 (RNU4-1B), missing in assembly
issue.description: RNU4-1B (GeneID: 26836) aligns to multiple positions with reduced % ID, suggesting this gene may not be represented in the current assembly (Build 36).
issue.resolution_text: RNU4-1B has been withdrawn and declared redundant to RNU4-2 which is already represented in the Reference

issue.summary: GeneID: 10436 (EMG1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_006331.6 (EMG1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Since neighboring clone AC006512.13 represents the correct sequence for NM_006331.7, the switchpoints in the overlap of U47924.1 and AC006512.13 have been adjusted to include the sequence from AC006512.13 at position NC_000012.11:7080212-7080213.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10536 (LEPREL2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_014262.3 (LEPREL2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The addition of mini-contig KF459681.1 (contained in U47924.1) fixes the 'G' deletion and premature termination of LEPREL2 (NM_014262.3) in the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 23479 (ISCU), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_213595.2 (ISCU) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695196) has been submitted to Genbank to fix the deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 51019 (CCDC53), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_016053.2 (CCDC53) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695207) has been submitted to Genbank to fix the deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 51348 (KLRF1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_016523.1 (KLRF1) and the genomic sequence in the reference to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573680.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC007068.17 and improving the alignment of KLRF1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 84876 (ORAI1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_032790.3 (ORAI1) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF511472.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC140062.11 and improving the alignment of ORAI1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC140077.17 and AC094008.10
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap issue can be followed in HG-1398

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC011611.26 and AC093718.3
issue.resolution_text: RP11-453D16 (AC233290) closes the gap. This closes the gap between AC011611 and AC093718, making AC154095 and AC205580 redundant.

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Gap Problem Region #3
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC145420.4 and AC145421.5
issue.resolution_text: Futher work on this gap can be followed in HG-1400

issue.summary: GeneID: 283463 (MUC19) has poor alignment to the Reference
issue.status_text: Declaring this issue stalled for now, as members of the MUC community does not seem to have much data on MUC19.
issue.description: Poor alignment between Genomic Reference Sequence component AC024935.34 and MUC19 (NM_173600.2).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145426.6 and AC148477.3.
issue.resolution_text: Further work on this gap can be followed in ticket HG-1402

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC233290.2 and AC117491.9
issue.resolution_text: AC233290.2 was sequenced and used to close this gap (AC154095.1 was removed as it is redundant).

issue.summary: GeneID: 374462 (PTPRQ), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: AC083812.24 appears to have an internal inversion compared to Celera NW_001838061.2 (AADB02015318.1)
issue.resolution_text: ABBA01053496.1 has been added to GRCh38 and marked 'contained' in AC083812.24, correcting the inversion in AC083812.24 and the alignment of PTPRQ to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC215219.3 and AC026369.21
issue.resolution_text: This patch closes the gap located between components AC215219.3 and AC026369.21 in reference chromosome NC_000012.11.

issue.summary: GeneID: 121273 (C12orf54), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000012.11 nt 48,888,763 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_152319.3 (GeneID: 121273 (C12orf54)).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459679.1 has been added to GRCh38 to patch AC089987.26 and improve the alignment of C12orf54 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Incorrect orientation for AC215219.3
issue.description: AC215219.3 is in the wrong orientation (+) in GRCh37
issue.resolution_text: AC026369.21 now in correct orientation

issue.summary: GeneID: 5542 (PRB1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: The reference genome contains a T vs. the C at nt 491 of NM_005039.3.
issue.resolution_text: AC238694.2 (ABC24-2362C23) provides representation for the coding allele of PRB1 (GeneID: 5542). AC238694.2 has been added to the Chr. 12 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 using AC010176.12 as the anchor.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Assembly gap
issue.description: There is a gap in NC_000012.11 at coordinates 7180000-7250000
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-56. Please see Jira issue HG-56 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: Chr. 12 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between AC145426.6 and AC148477.3 .
issue.resolution_text: A 10kb extension into this gap since GRCh37 has been released as a FIX patch to GRCh37: GL383548.1.
